TopicTitle: 3 min. "Take that environmentalists!" - Landing my new Shuttle (+ blowing up the VAB)

Articles.Content:
I'm going to call this a video as it is a highlight from my stream and not the actual stream.

Long story short I wanted to dispose of my new shuttles test bed in the most environmentally friendly way a.k.a. bombing the only active non-environmental plant on the planet... ehm... *cough* the KSC *cough*

Enjoy!

[Link] Landing my new Shuttle! (+ blowing up the VAB)
